text: Lalle ne haƙiƙa waɗanda suka ce: "Lalle ne Allah, shine Masihu, ɗan Maryama," sun kafirta. Alhali kuwa Masihu ya ce: "Ya Bani Isra'ila! Ku bauta wa Allah Ubangijina, kuma Ubangijinku." Lalle ne shi, wanda ya yi shirki da Allah, to, lalle ne, Allah Ya haramta masa Aljanna. Kuma babu wasu mataimaka ga azzalumai
